short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automates the creation of Shopify stores in my custom funnel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify your Shopify workflows with the Shopify Store Automation Tool. This extension automates repetitive tasks, navigates Shopify pages seamlessly, and streamlines store setup. Save time with personalized settings and focus on growing your business while the tool handles the heavy lifting. Perfect for e-commerce entrepreneurs and Shopify partners.
